description: Amendments to planning permission dated 12 July 2022 (RN 21/07264/FULL) for the Alterations and extensions to the Ritz Hotel and William Kent House including the change of use of the casino to a dual flexible use as hotel and/or private members club, a two storey side extension to William Kent House, extensions to the Ritz hotel including on the site of 22 Arlington Street comprising an extension of five basements, lower ground, ground, mezzanine and seven upper floors to provide additional hotel floorspace, new and upgraded hotel facilities including hotel rooms, restaurant and spa, new entrances on Arlington Street, arrival and drop off facilities, changes to the servicing and refuse facilities, car and cycle parking, plant, landscaping and all works including demolition, enabling, highways and other ancillary works. Namely, internal alterations including minor floor plan amendments; external alterations to William Kent House; the Ritz building, garden and secret garden; and to the Arlington Street extension; and amendments to wording of conditions 7 and 8.
